role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs googler on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs googler on nearly any platform. googler is a power tool to Google (web, news, videos and site search) from the command-line. It shows the title, URL and abstract for each result, which can be directly opened in a browser from the terminal. Results are fetched in pages (with page navigation). Supports sequential searches in a single googler instance.
